column4: hello everyone, I kicked off a vmbuilder script, but it shows no feedback for 10 mins already. It's hard for me to know if it's running at all. Does it have some log files somewhere?
anyone knows of a freenode channel for VM stuff specifically?
#vbox if you're after specifically that VM program
HexLaTor: neither of these, I want to make vmbuilder report any progress (it's mute for 10mins already)
